#Download Tweets
```{r}

```
#Plot tweets
```{r}
counts=table(T1$screenName)

T1$counts <- 1

barplot(counts, las=2)
plot(T1$counts ~ T1$created)


h.str <- as.numeric(format(T1$created, "%d"))

plot(T1$counts ~ h.str)
hist(T1$created, breaks = "h")
```
